statements: UPSERT INTO patients (id, name, age, gender) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 30, 'Male') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='John Doe', age=30, gender='Male';
UPSERT INTO patients (id, name, age, gender) VALUES (2, 'Jane Smith', 25, 'Female') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name='Jane Smith', age=25, gender='Female';
UPSERT INTO appointments (id, date, patient_id, doctor_id) VALUES (1, '2023-01-15', 1, 101) ON CONFLICT (id) DO UPDATE SET date='2023-01-15', patient_id=1, doctor_id=101;

UPSERT INTO Patients (patient_id, patient_name, age, gender, diagnosis) VALUES (1, 'John Doe', 35, 'Male', 'Fever') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE patient_name='John Doe', age=35, gender='Male', diagnosis='Fever';

UPSERT INTO Doctors (doctor_id, doctor_name, specialization, hospital_name) VALUES (1, 'Dr. Smith', 'Cardiologist', 'City Hospital') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE doctor_name='Dr. Smith', specialization='Cardiologist', hospital_name='City Hospital';

UPSERT INTO Appointments (appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date, appointment_time, status) VALUES (1, 1, 1, '2022-12-01', '09:00:00', 'Scheduled') ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE patient_id=1, doctor_id=1, appointment_date='2022-12-01', appointment_time='09:00:00', status='Scheduled';
